data.text: The word of the Lord that came to Jeremiah the prophet against the Philistines, before that Pharaoh smote Gaza.
At the noise of the stamping of the hoofs of his strong horses,
Because of the day that cometh to spoil all the Philistines,
O thou sword of the Lord, how long will it be ere thou be quiet?
How can it be quiet, seeing the Lord hath given it a charge
